attributes.action: stop the building of unaffordable flats and houses in cornwall and other areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are becoming surrounded by luxury flats and unaffordable houses, all a developer has to do is say they'll put a couple affordable houses in there development to get the permission they need.

We don't want or need and can't afford luxury flats.
